text: František Václav Lobkowicz ( 1947 – 17 February 2022) was a Czech Roman Catholic prelate. He was bishop of Ostrava-Opava from 1996 until he died. Lobkowicz died on 17 February 2022. He was 74 years old.Zemřel ostravsko- opavský biskup Mons. František Václav Lobkowicz O.Praem ==References== Category:1940s births Category:2022 deaths Category:Czech people Category:Roman Catholic bishops
title: František Václav Lobkowicz
